qas.question: In what years was Cyprus divided?
Which part of Cyprus was occupied by the Turkish army?
What organization recognizes the sovereignty of the Republic of Cyprus?

context: Since 1965, following clashes between the two communities, the Turkish Cypriot seats in the House remain vacant. In <a0_0>1974<a0_0/> Cyprus was divided de facto when the Turkish army occupied the <a1_0>northern third of the island<a1_0/>. The Turkish Cypriots subsequently declared <a2_0>independence<a2_0/> in 1983 as the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus but were recognised only by Turkey. In 1985 the TRNC adopted a constitution and held its first elections. <a3_0>The United Nations<a3_0/> recognises the sovereignty of the Republic of Cyprus over the entire island of Cyprus.
